  • Deprecated Interfaces 
    Interface and Description
    org.hibernate.boot.spi.AdditionalJaxbMappingProducer
    Intended for Envers integration until we can migrate Envers away from XML generation for building its model.
    org.hibernate.resource.transaction.backend.jta.internal.synchronization.AfterCompletionAction
    (since 5.2) - probably getting removed in 5.2 as well. This was an SPI contract intended for HEM that is no longer needed.
    org.hibernate.ejb.AvailableSettings
    use org.hibernate.jpa.AvailableSettings
    org.hibernate.BasicQueryContract
    (since 5.2) use CommonQueryContract instead.
    org.hibernate.tool.hbm2ddl.ConnectionHelper
    Everything in this package has been replaced with SchemaManagementTool and friends.
    org.hibernate.jpa.HibernateEntityManager
    (snce 5.2) Use Session (or SessionImplementor), as it now extends EntityManager directly
    org.hibernate.ejb.HibernateEntityManager
    Use HibernateEntityManager instead
    org.hibernate.jpa.HibernateEntityManagerFactory
    (since 5.2) Use SessionFactory (or SessionFactoryImplementor) as it now extends EntityManagerFactory directly
    org.hibernate.ejb.HibernateEntityManagerFactory
    Use HibernateEntityManagerFactory instead
    org.hibernate.jpa.spi.HibernateEntityManagerFactoryAware
    (since 5.2) Why do we need an over-arching access to HibernateEntityManagerFactory across multiple contract hierarchies?
    org.hibernate.jpa.spi.HibernateEntityManagerImplementor
    (since 5.2) move these methods to SessionImplementor
    org.hibernate.ejb.HibernateQuery
    Use HibernateQuery instead
    org.hibernate.resource.transaction.backend.jta.internal.synchronization.ManagedFlushChecker
    (since 5.2) no longer needed since integrating HEM into hibernate-core.
    org.hibernate.cfg.NamingStrategy
    A org.hibernate.cfg.naming.NamingStrategyDelegator should be used instead.
    org.hibernate.hql.internal.ast.tree.ParameterContainer
    See entire discussion above
    org.hibernate.tuple.Property
    Use the direct Attribute hierarchy
    org.hibernate.Query
    (since 5.2) use Query instead
    org.hibernate.cache.RegionFactory
    Moved, but still need this definition for ehcache
    org.hibernate.mapping.RelationalModel
    (since 5.2) not needed anymore.
    org.hibernate.integrator.spi.ServiceContributingIntegrator
    A separate ServiceContributor should be used instead.
    org.hibernate.engine.spi.SessionOwner
    (since 5.2) since consolidating hibernate-entitymanager into hibernate-core I believe this is no longer needed.
    org.hibernate.SQLQuery
    (since 5.2) use NativeQuery instead.
    org.hibernate.type.descriptor.WrapperOptionsContext
    (since 5.2) Just directly implement WrapperOptions
  • Deprecated Classes 
    Class and Description
    org.hibernate.tool.hbm2ddl.ColumnMetadata
    Use ColumnInformation or ColumnInformationImpl instead
    org.hibernate.internal.util.ConfigHelper
    Use ClassLoaderService instead
    org.hibernate.dialect.DerbyDialect
    HHH-6073
    org.hibernate.internal.util.xml.DTDEntityResolver
    Hibernate now uses StAX for XML processing and the role of this class is served now by LocalXmlResourceResolver
    org.hibernate.property.access.spi.EnhancedGetterMethodImpl
    No longer used; GetterFieldImpl or GetterMethodImpl should be used instead.
    org.hibernate.criterion.Expression
    Use Restrictions instead
    org.hibernate.tool.hbm2ddl.ForeignKeyMetadata
    Everything in this package has been replaced with SchemaManagementTool and friends.
    org.hibernate.criterion.IlikeExpression
    Prefer LikeExpression which now has case-insensitivity capability.
    org.hibernate.tool.hbm2ddl.IndexMetadata
    Everything in this package has been replaced with SchemaManagementTool and friends.
    org.hibernate.tool.instrument.javassist.InstrumentTask
    This is the legacy Ant-task Hibernate provided historically to perform its old-school bytecode instrumentation. That has been replaced wholesale with a new approach to bytecode manipulation offering 3 build-time variations for Ant, Maven and Gradle.
    org.hibernate.internal.util.jndi.JndiHelper
    As JNDI access should get routed through JndiService
    org.hibernate.id.MultipleHiLoPerTableGenerator
    Use TableGenerator instead.
    org.hibernate.spatial.dialect.mysql.MySQL56InnoDBSpatialDialect
    Use "hibernate.dialect.storage_engine=innodb" environment variable or JVM system property instead.
    org.hibernate.dialect.MySQL57InnoDBDialect
    Use "hibernate.dialect.storage_engine=innodb" environment variable or JVM system property instead.
    org.hibernate.dialect.MySQL5InnoDBDialect
    Use "hibernate.dialect.storage_engine=innodb" environment variable or JVM system property instead.
    org.hibernate.spatial.dialect.mysql.MySQL5InnoDBSpatialDialect
    Use "hibernate.dialect.storage_engine=innodb" environment variable or JVM system property instead.
    org.hibernate.dialect.MySQLInnoDBDialect
    Use "hibernate.dialect.storage_engine=innodb" environment variable or JVM system property instead.
    org.hibernate.dialect.MySQLMyISAMDialect
    Use "hibernate.dialect.storage_engine=myisam" environment variable or JVM system property instead.
    org.hibernate.dialect.Oracle9Dialect
    Use either Oracle9iDialect or Oracle10gDialect instead
    org.hibernate.dialect.OracleDialect
    Use Oracle8iDialect instead.
    org.hibernate.spatial.dialect.postgis.PostgisDialect
    "Use one of the PostgisPGNNDialect classes"
    org.hibernate.dialect.PostgreSQLDialect
    use PostgreSQL82Dialect instead
    org.hibernate.mapping.PropertyGeneration
    This is replaced by ValueGeneration and GenerationTiming
    org.hibernate.lob.ReaderInputStream
    Should not be used anymore.
    org.hibernate.tool.hbm2ddl.SchemaUpdateCommand
    Everything in this package has been replaced with SchemaManagementTool and friends.
    org.hibernate.id.SequenceGenerator
    Use SequenceStyleGenerator instead
    org.hibernate.id.SequenceHiLoGenerator
    See deprecation discussion on SequenceGenerator
    org.hibernate.id.SequenceIdentityGenerator
    See deprecation discussion on SequenceGenerator
    org.hibernate.cfg.Settings
    Use SessionFactoryOptions instead.
    org.hibernate.exception.internal.SQLStateConverter
    Use StandardSQLExceptionConverter with SQLStateConversionDelegate instead
    org.hibernate.tuple.StandardProperty
    Use one of the Attribute-based impls instead.
    org.hibernate.tool.hbm2ddl.TableMetadata
    Everything in this package has been replaced with SchemaManagementTool and friends.
    org.hibernate.internal.util.xml.XMLHelper
    Currently only used for integration with HCANN. The rest of Hibernate uses StAX now for XML processing. See org.hibernate.boot.jaxb.internal.stax
  • Deprecated Enums 
    Enum and Description
    org.hibernate.envers.ModificationStore
    since 5.2, to be removed in 6.0 with no replacement.
    org.hibernate.annotations.SortType
    Since Sort is deprecated.
    org.hibernate.boot.jaxb.internal.stax.SupportedOrmXsdVersion
    since 5.0; no longer used internally.
  • Deprecated Exceptions 
    Exceptions and Description
    org.hibernate.tool.hbm2ddl.ImportScriptException
    Everything in this package has been replaced with SchemaManagementTool and friends.
    org.hibernate.MappingNotFoundException
    Use MappingNotFoundException instead.
    org.hibernate.OptimisticLockException
    Use OptimisticEntityLockException instead
    org.hibernate.cfg.RecoverableException
    Was only ever referenced in a single place, in an extremely dubious way.
    org.hibernate.internal.util.xml.UnsupportedOrmXsdVersionException
    Migrating to boot package; all usages will eventually be replaced by UnsupportedOrmXsdVersionException
    org.hibernate.boot.jaxb.internal.stax.UnsupportedOrmXsdVersionException
    Use UnsupportedOrmXsdVersionException instead
  • Deprecated Annotation Types 
    Annotation Type and Description
    org.hibernate.annotations.AccessType
    Use AttributeAccessor instead; renamed to avoid confusion with the JPA AccessType enum.
    org.hibernate.annotations.Entity
    See individual attributes for intended replacements. To be removed in 4.1
    org.hibernate.annotations.ForeignKey
    Prefer the JPA 2.1 introduced ForeignKey instead.
    org.hibernate.annotations.Index
    Using Index instead.
    org.hibernate.annotations.IndexColumn
    Prefer the standard JPA OrderColumn annotation and the Hibernate specific ListIndexBase (for replacing IndexColumn.base()).
    org.hibernate.annotations.Sort
    Use SortComparator or SortNatural instead depending on need.
  • Deprecated Fields 
    Field and Description
    org.hibernate.cfg.AvailableSettings.ACQUIRE_CONNECTIONS
    (since 5.2) use AvailableSettings.CONNECTION_HANDLING instead
    org.hibernate.cfg.AvailableSettings.APP_CLASSLOADER
    Use AvailableSettings.CLASSLOADERS instead
    org.hibernate.jpa.AvailableSettings.CDI_BEAN_MANAGER
    (since 5.2) use AvailableSettings.CDI_BEAN_MANAGER instead
    org.hibernate.FetchMode.EAGER
    use FetchMode.JOIN
    org.hibernate.internal.util.collections.CollectionHelper.EMPTY_COLLECTION
    use Collections.EMPTY_LIST or Collections.emptyList() instead
    org.hibernate.internal.util.collections.CollectionHelper.EMPTY_LIST
    use Collections.EMPTY_LIST or Collections.emptyList() instead
    org.hibernate.internal.util.collections.CollectionHelper.EMPTY_MAP
    use Collections.EMPTY_MAP or Collections.emptyMap() instead
    org.hibernate.cfg.AvailableSettings.ENVIRONMENT_CLASSLOADER
    Use AvailableSettings.CLASSLOADERS instead
    org.hibernate.sql.JoinFragment.FULL_JOIN
    use JoinType.FULL_JOIN instead.
    org.hibernate.criterion.CriteriaSpecification.FULL_JOIN
    use JoinType.FULL_JOIN
    org.hibernate.cfg.AvailableSettings.HIBERNATE_CLASSLOADER
    Use AvailableSettings.CLASSLOADERS instead
    org.hibernate.id.enhanced.OptimizerFactory.HILO
    Use StandardOptimizerDescriptor.getExternalName() via StandardOptimizerDescriptor.HILO
    org.hibernate.jpa.QueryHints.HINT_TIMEOUT
    use QueryHints.SPEC_HINT_TIMEOUT instead
    org.hibernate.cache.infinispan.InfinispanRegionFactory.INFINISPAN_USE_SYNCHRONIZATION_PROP
    Infinispan Second Level Cache is designed to always register as synchronization on transactional caches, or use non-transactional caches.
    org.hibernate.sql.JoinFragment.INNER_JOIN
    use JoinType.INNER_JOIN instead.
    org.hibernate.criterion.CriteriaSpecification.INNER_JOIN
    use JoinType.INNER_JOIN
    org.hibernate.jpa.AvailableSettings.INTERCEPTOR
    (since 5.2) use AvailableSettings.INTERCEPTOR instead

    (since 5.2) use AvailableSettings.JPA_JDBC_DRIVER instead

    (since 5.2) use AvailableSettings.JPA_JDBC_URL instead

    (since 5.2) use AvailableSettings.JPA_JDBC_USER instead
    org.hibernate.cfg.AvailableSettings.JPA_METAMODEL_GENERATION
    use AvailableSettings.JPA_METAMODEL_POPULATION instead.
    org.hibernate.cfg.AvailableSettings.JPA_METAMODEL_POPULATION
    org.hibernate.jpa.AvailableSettings.JTA_DATASOURCE
    (since 5.2) use AvailableSettings.JPA_JTA_DATASOURCE instead
    org.hibernate.FetchMode.LAZY
    use FetchMode.SELECT
    org.hibernate.criterion.CriteriaSpecification.LEFT_JOIN
    use JoinType.LEFT_OUTER_JOIN
    org.hibernate.sql.JoinFragment.LEFT_OUTER_JOIN
    use JoinType.LEFT_OUTER_JOIN instead.
    org.hibernate.id.enhanced.OptimizerFactory.LEGACY_HILO
    Use StandardOptimizerDescriptor.getExternalName() via StandardOptimizerDescriptor.LEGACY_HILO
    org.hibernate.jpa.AvailableSettings.LOCK_SCOPE
    (since 5.2) use AvailableSettings.JPA_LOCK_SCOPE instead
    org.hibernate.jpa.AvailableSettings.LOCK_TIMEOUT
    (since 5.2) use AvailableSettings.JPA_LOCK_TIMEOUT instead
    org.hibernate.jpa.AvailableSettings.NON_JTA_DATASOURCE
    (since 5.2) use AvailableSettings.JPA_NON_JTA_DATASOURCE instead
    org.hibernate.id.enhanced.OptimizerFactory.NONE
    Use StandardOptimizerDescriptor.getExternalName() via StandardOptimizerDescriptor.NONE
    org.hibernate.id.SequenceGenerator.PARAMETERS
    No longer supported. To specify initial-value or increment use the org.hibernate.id.enhanced.SequenceStyleGenerator generator instead.
    org.hibernate.cache.infinispan.InfinispanRegionFactory.PENDING_PUTS_CACHE_NAME
    Use InfinispanRegionFactory.DEF_PENDING_PUTS_RESOURCE instead.
    org.hibernate.jpa.AvailableSettings.PERSIST_VALIDATION_GROUP
    (since 5.2) use AvailableSettings.JPA_PERSIST_VALIDATION_GROUP instead
    org.hibernate.id.enhanced.OptimizerFactory.POOL
    Use StandardOptimizerDescriptor.getExternalName() via StandardOptimizerDescriptor.POOLED
    org.hibernate.id.enhanced.OptimizerFactory.POOL_LO
    Use StandardOptimizerDescriptor.getExternalName() via StandardOptimizerDescriptor.POOLED_LO
    org.hibernate.cfg.AvailableSettings.PREFER_POOLED_VALUES_LO
    Use AvailableSettings.PREFERRED_POOLED_OPTIMIZER instead
    org.hibernate.jpa.AvailableSettings.PROVIDER
    (since 5.2) use AvailableSettings.JPA_PERSISTENCE_PROVIDER instead
    org.hibernate.cfg.AvailableSettings.PROXOOL_PREFIX
    Use AvailableSettings.PROXOOL_CONFIG_PREFIX instead
    org.hibernate.cfg.AvailableSettings.QUERY_PLAN_CACHE_MAX_SOFT_REFERENCES
    in favor of AvailableSettings.QUERY_PLAN_CACHE_MAX_SIZE
    org.hibernate.cfg.AvailableSettings.QUERY_PLAN_CACHE_MAX_STRONG_REFERENCES
    in favor of AvailableSettings.QUERY_PLAN_CACHE_PARAMETER_METADATA_MAX_SIZE

    org.hibernate.jpa.AvailableSettings.SCHEMA_GEN_CONNECTION

  • Deprecated Methods 
    Method and Description
    org.hibernate.cfg.Configuration.add(XmlDocument)
    No longer supported.
    org.hibernate.boot.MetadataSources.addClass(Class)
    hbm.xml is a legacy mapping format now considered deprecated.
    org.hibernate.cfg.Configuration.addDocument(Document)
    Use addURL, addResource, addFile, etc. instead
    org.hibernate.boot.MetadataSources.addDocument(Document)
    since 5.0. Use one of the other methods for passing mapping source(s).
    org.hibernate.persister.entity.AbstractPropertyMapping.addPropertyPath(String, Type, String[], String[], String[], String[])
    Use AbstractPropertyMapping.addPropertyPath(String, Type, String[], String[], String[], String[], Mapping) instead
    org.hibernate.cfg.Configuration.addResource(String, ClassLoader)
    This form (accepting a ClassLoader) is no longer supported. Instead, add the ClassLoader to the ClassLoaderService on the ServiceRegistry associated with this Configuration
    org.hibernate.cfg.Configuration.addXML(String)
    No longer supported
    org.hibernate.dialect.Dialect.appendLockHint(LockMode, String)
    use appendLockHint(LockOptions,String) instead
    org.hibernate.boot.SessionFactoryBuilder.applyConnectionReleaseMode(ConnectionReleaseMode)
    Use SessionFactoryBuilder.applyConnectionHandlingMode(org.hibernate.resource.jdbc.spi.PhysicalConnectionHandlingMode) instead
    org.hibernate.boot.SessionFactoryBuilder.applyDefaultEntityMode(EntityMode)
    Different entity modes per entity is soon to be removed as a feature.
    org.hibernate.boot.SessionFactoryBuilder.applyQuerySubstitutions(Map)
    This is a legacy feature and should never be needed anymore...
    org.hibernate.boot.MetadataBuilder.applyReflectionManager(ReflectionManager)
    Deprecated (with no replacement) to indicate that this will go away as we migrate away from Hibernate Commons Annotations to Jandex for annotation handling and XMl->annotation merging.
    org.hibernate.dialect.Dialect.bindLimitParametersFirst()
    Dialect.getLimitHandler() should be overridden instead.
    org.hibernate.dialect.Dialect.bindLimitParametersInReverseOrder()
    Dialect.getLimitHandler() should be overridden instead.
    org.hibernate.cache.spi.RegionFactory.buildEntityRegion(String, Properties, CacheDataDescription)
    (since 5.2) use the form taking Map instead
    org.hibernate.cfg.Configuration.buildMappings()
    Does nothing
    org.hibernate.cache.spi.RegionFactory.buildNaturalIdRegion(String, Properties, CacheDataDescription)
    (since 5.2) use the form accepting a Map instead
    org.hibernate.id.enhanced.OptimizerFactory.buildOptimizer(String, Class, int)
    Use OptimizerFactory.buildOptimizer(String, Class, int, long) instead
    org.hibernate.cache.spi.RegionFactory.buildQueryResultsRegion(String, Properties)
    (since 5.2) use the form taking Map instead
    org.hibernate.dialect.Dialect.buildSQLExceptionConverter()
    Dialect.buildSQLExceptionConversionDelegate() should be overridden instead.
    org.hibernate.tuple.PropertyFactory.buildStandardProperty(Property, boolean)
    See mainly PropertyFactory.buildEntityBasedAttribute(org.hibernate.persister.entity.EntityPersister, org.hibernate.engine.spi.SessionFactoryImplementor, int, org.hibernate.mapping.Property, boolean)
    org.hibernate.cache.spi.RegionFactory.buildTimestampsRegion(String, Properties)
    (since 5.2) use the form taking Map
    org.hibernate.cfg.annotations.TableBinder.buildUniqueConstraints(UniqueConstraint[])
    Use TableBinder.buildUniqueConstraintHolders(javax.persistence.UniqueConstraint[]) instead
    org.hibernate.boot.archive.scan.spi.ScanOptions.canDetectHibernateMappingFiles()
    With move to unified schema, this setting is now deprecated and will be removed once support for reading hbm.xml files is fully removed.
    org.hibernate.engine.config.spi.ConfigurationService.cast(Class<T>, Object)
    No idea why this is exposed here...
    org.hibernate.internal.util.ReflectHelper.classForName(String)
    Depending on context, either ClassLoaderService or ClassLoaderAccess should be preferred
    org.hibernate.c3p0.internal.C3P0ConnectionProvider.close()
    Use C3P0ConnectionProvider.stop() instead
    org.hibernate.proxool.internal.ProxoolConnectionProvider.close()
    Use ProxoolConnectionProvider.stop() instead
    org.hibernate.query.internal.QueryParameterBindingsImpl.collectBindTypes()
    (since 5.2) expect a different approach to org.hibernate.engine.spi.QueryParameters in 6.0
    org.hibernate.query.internal.QueryParameterBindingsImpl.collectBindValues()
    (since 5.2) expect a different approach to org.hibernate.engine.spi.QueryParameters in 6.0
    org.hibernate.query.internal.QueryParameterBindingsImpl.collectNamedParameterBindings()
    (since 5.2) expect a different approach to org.hibernate.engine.spi.QueryParameters in 6.0
    org.hibernate.query.internal.QueryParameterBindingsImpl.collectPositionalBindTypes()
    (since 5.2) expect a different approach to org.hibernate.engine.spi.QueryParameters in 6.0
    org.hibernate.query.internal.QueryParameterBindingsImpl.collectPositionalBindValues()
    (since 5.2) expect a different approach to org.hibernate.engine.spi.QueryParameters in 6.0
    org.hibernate.cfg.Configuration.configure(Document)
    No longer supported.
    org.hibernate.StatelessSession.connection()
    just missed when deprecating same method from Session
    org.hibernate.SharedSessionBuilder.connectionReleaseMode()
    (snce 6.0) use SharedSessionBuilder.connectionHandlingMode() instead.
    org.hibernate.SessionBuilder.connectionReleaseMode(ConnectionReleaseMode)
    (since 5.2) use SessionBuilder.connectionHandlingMode(org.hibernate.resource.jdbc.spi.PhysicalConnectionHandlingMode) instead
    org.hibernate.dialect.Dialect.convertToFirstRowValue(int)
    Dialect.getLimitHandler() should be overridden instead.
    org.hibernate.criterion.ProjectionList.create()
    an instance factory method does not make sense
    org.hibernate.hql.internal.ast.util.ASTUtil.create(ASTFactory, int, String)
    silly
    org.hibernate.Criteria.createAlias(String, String, int)
    use Criteria.createAlias(String, String, org.hibernate.sql.JoinType)
    org.hibernate.criterion.DetachedCriteria.createAlias(String, String, int)
    use DetachedCriteria.createAlias(String, String, JoinType)
    org.hibernate.Criteria.createAlias(String, String, int, Criterion)
    use Criteria.createAlias(String, String, JoinType, Criterion)
    org.hibernate.criterion.DetachedCriteria.createAlias(String, String, int, Criterion)
    use DetachedCriteria.createAlias(String, String, JoinType, Criterion)
    org.hibernate.SharedSessionContract.createCriteria(Class)
    (since 5.2) for Session, use the JPA Criteria
    org.hibernate.SharedSessionContract.createCriteria(Class, String)
    (since 5.2) for Session, use the JPA Criteria
    org.hibernate.SharedSessionContract.createCriteria(String)
    (since 5.2) for Session, use the JPA Criteria
    org.hibernate.Criteria.createCriteria(String, int)
    use Criteria.createAlias(String, String, org.hibernate.sql.JoinType)
    org.hibernate.criterion.DetachedCriteria.createCriteria(String, int)
    use DetachedCriteria.createCriteria(String, JoinType)
    org.hibernate.SharedSessionContract.createCriteria(String, String)
    (since 5.2) for Session, use the JPA Criteria
    org.hibernate.Criteria.createCriteria(String, String, int)
    use Criteria.createCriteria(String, org.hibernate.sql.JoinType)
    org.hibernate.criterion.DetachedCriteria.createCriteria(String, String, int)
    use DetachedCriteria.createCriteria(String, String, JoinType)
    org.hibernate.Criteria.createCriteria(String, String, int, Criterion)
    use Criteria.createCriteria(String, String, org.hibernate.sql.JoinType, org.hibernate.criterion.Criterion)
    org.hibernate.criterion.DetachedCriteria.createCriteria(String, String, int, Criterion)
    use DetachedCriteria.createCriteria(String, String, JoinType, Criterion)
    org.hibernate.engine.query.spi.NativeQueryInterpreter.createCustomLoader(CustomQuery, SessionFactoryImplementor)
    This method will be removed in 6.
    org.hibernate.id.IdentifierGeneratorHelper.createNumber(long, Class)
    Use the holders instead.
    org.hibernate.engine.spi.SessionImplementor.createQuery(String, Class<T>, Selection, HibernateEntityManagerImplementor.QueryOptions)
    (since 5.2) - see deprecation note on super
    org.hibernate.jpa.spi.HibernateEntityManagerImplementor.createQuery(String, Class<T>, Selection, HibernateEntityManagerImplementor.QueryOptions)
    (since 5.2) this method form is used to construct a "compiled" representation of a JPA Criteria query. However it assumes the old yucky implementation of "compilation" that converted the Criteria into a HQL/JPQL string. In 6.0 that is re-written from scratch to compile to SQM, and so this method would not be needed in 6.0
    org.hibernate.query.QueryProducer.createSQLQuery(String)
    (since 5.2) use QueryProducer.createNativeQuery(String) instead
    org.hibernate.type.TypeFactory.custom(Class<UserType>, Properties, TypeFactory.TypeScope)
    Only for use temporary use by Hibernate
    org.hibernate.type.TypeFactory.customComponent(Class<CompositeUserType>, Properties, TypeFactory.TypeScope)
    Only for use temporary use by Hibernate
    org.hibernate.engine.spi.SessionImplementor.delete(String, Object, boolean, Set)
    OperationalContext should cover this overload I believe; Gail?
    org.hibernate.internal.CoreMessageLogger.deprecatedManyToManyFetch()
    Use DeprecationLogger.deprecatedManyToManyFetch() instead
    org.hibernate.internal.CoreMessageLogger.deprecatedManyToManyOuterJoin()
    Use DeprecationLogger.deprecatedManyToManyOuterJoin() instead
    org.hibernate.Query.determineProperBooleanType(int, Object, Type)
    added only to allow default method definition for deprecated methods here.

    org.hibernate.engine.transaction.spi.TransactionImplementor.invalidate()
    (since 5.2) as part of effort to consolidate support for JPA and Hibernate SessionFactory, Session, etc natively, support for local Transaction delegates to remain "valid" after they are committed or rolled-back (and to a degree after the owning Session is closed) to more closely comply with the JPA spec natively in terms of allowing that extended access after Session is closed. Hibernate impls have all been changed to no-op here.

    Enum Constant and Description
    org.hibernate.annotations.CascadeType.DELETE_ORPHAN

    instead use PESSIMISTIC_WRITE
